text: The idea of this is great but sadly it doens't work. I had saved a long page and when I went to resume, the extension only worked for one scroll.

Most underrated and less reviewed extension, that is why I found it after 37 minutes of searching here and there for this exact feature. Go for it, it is working as of now (19 November 2023). Best scroll saver that I found which is really working. Thanks Developers !!
Just installed and tested it. works as intended. will report back for longer use.

This plugin is very user-friendly and responsive, but there is one issue (or rather, a suggestion): there is no way to synchronize, meaning that when logged in on different devices, you can only see the locally saved settings and cannot access the settings from other computers.
the best i could find right now

The other extensions aren't as good or reliable, so I'm glad this one exists. Please keep it like this, at least at its core functionality. It works perfectly. Thank you and Great Job!

Never mind the top-placing review by Aliez. I tend towards as simple as possible... but the way this extension is set up is fantastic.

A feature request: I set up a Chrome keyboard shortcut to activate the extension... and to keep it mouse-free, it'd be great once the extension is activated to be able to hit "F", "U" or "D" to select one of the 3 options.

Great extension, works as advertised. Have tried a few similar extensions and this one finally works very smoothly. Great work. Only suggestion (if it's still possible): the name is pretty difficult to google, the SEO makes it impossible to find. Only stumbled upon this extension via producthunt

It works fine. But I think there can be improvement in user experience.

1. I don't need fetch\update options. Just an icon to make users know that current page's scroll position has been saved is enough.
2. Auto remember position is better so that users don't need to click save button. Besides, some people may forget to click that button.
3. I think the page showing users' saved scroll bookmarks is redundant. This extension aims at remembering page scroll position, not saving bookmarks for u... Show more

This extension works fine, and is as user friendly as it can be, with the limited storage space Google offers for scroll bookmarks. rated 2 star, because I saw it advertised on other people's scroll bookmarker extensions, with a referral link.
I have tried many other similar extensions previously but believe me when I say that, this is the only extension that works.
Awesome extension! Comes in handy a lot of times when you cannot finish an article.
